card.name: Natural Snare
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

card.name: Faerie Life
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Miraculous Meltdown
card.text: ■ Multi ■ You can cast this spell only if your opponent has more shields than you do. ■ Your opponent chooses one of his shields for each shield you have. He puts the rest of his shields into his hand. ''(He can use the "shield trigger" abilities of those shields.)''

card.name: Inferno Sign
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put a non-evolution creature that costs 7 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Hyperspatial Bolshack Hole
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent’s creatures that has 3000 power or less. ■ Choose one of the following. :► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. :► Put a fire psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Bolshack Dragon, the Temporal Blaze
card.text: ■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. ■ Double Breaker ■ Awaken—When this creature wins a battle, Bolshack Möbius, Victory Awakened

card.name: Bolshack Möbius, Victory Awakened
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less. ■ Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it is tapped. ■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. ■ Triple Breaker ■ Release

card.name: Beginning Romanov, Lord of the Demonic Eye
card.text: ■ Graveyard Galaxy Vortex evolution—Choose 3 darkness creatures in your graveyard and put this creature into the battle zone on top of those creatures. ■ Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose any number of cards under this creature and put them into your graveyard. For each card put into your graveyard in this way, choose a card in your opponent's hand at random. Then your opponent reveals that card and puts that card on the bottom of their deck. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Primal Scream
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Romanov the 1st, Lord of the Demonic Eye
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, search your deck. You may take a darkness card from your deck and put it into your graveyard. Then shuffle your deck. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast a darkness spell that costs 6 or less from your graveyard For No Cost

card.name: Hyperspatial Shooting Hole
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker". ■ Put a Fire psychic creature that costs 9 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Dark Lupia
card.text: ■ Whenever one of your Dragons are destroyed, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Sir Virginia, Mystic Light Insect
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. If that creature is an evolution creature that has the same race as this creature, you may put that creature into the battle zone For No Cost

card.name: Kill, Temporal Brawler
card.text: ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever any of your psychic creatures would be returned to your hand by one of your opponent's spells or the ability of one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone, that creature stays in the battle zone instead. ■ Awaken—At the Step#Step 2 (Draw) ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Setsudan, Awakened Giant
card.text: ■ Power Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever any of your psychic creatures would be returned to your hand by one of your opponent's spells or the ability of one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone, that creature stays in the battle zone instead.

card.name: Untouchable, Temporal Hero
card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, they Unchoosable ■ Awaken—At the end of each turn, if another of your Psychic Creatures awakened that turn, Untouchable Powered, the Awakened Protean ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Untouchable Powered, the Awakened Protean
card.text: ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, they Unchoosable

card.name: Hyperspatial Kill Hole
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker" and power 4000 or less. ■ Choose one of the following. :► Put a psychic creature that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. :► Put a Fire or Nature psychic creature that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Hyperspatial Gaial Hole
card.text: ■ Put up to 2 Fire psychic creatures that have total cost 8 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Jasmine, Mist Faerie
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Death Gate, Gate of Hell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: DNA Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ If you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

card.name: Bone Dance Charger
card.text: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Charger

card.name: Eternal Sign
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Put a non-evolution darkness or fire creature that costs 7 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. That creature gets "speed attacker" until the End Step

card.name: Mad Rock Chester Romanov, Purgatory Wicked God
card.text: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for the number of cards in each graveyard. It can't cost less than 2. ■ Graveyard Galaxy Vortex evolution: Choose 3 darkness or fire creatures in your graveyard and put this creature on top of those creatures. ■ Meteorburn: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put up to 3 cards under this creature into your graveyard. For each card put into your graveyard in this way, cast a darkness or fire spell that costs 6 or less from your graveyard for no cost and put it on the bottom of your deck. ■ Triple Breaker
